/ISAPI/AccessControl/RemoteControl/door.summary: Remotely control the door or elevator.

/ISAPI/AccessControl/capabilities.summary: Get the functional capability of access control.

capabilities.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<AccessControl version="2.0" xmlns="http://www.isapi.org/ver20/XMLSchema">
    <isSupportUserInfo>true</isSupportUserInfo>
    <isSupportDoorCfg>true</isSupportDoorCfg>
    <isSupportCardInfo>true</isSupportCardInfo>
    <EmployeeNoInfo>
        <employeeNo min="1" max="32">1</employeeNo>
        <characterType opt="any,number">number</characterType>
    </EmployeeNoInfo>
    <isSupportDeployInfo>true</isSupportDeployInfo>
    <isSupportEventCardLinkageCfg>true</isSupportEventCardLinkageCfg>
    <isSupportClearEventCardLinkageCfg>true</isSupportClearEventCardLinkageCfg>
    <isSupportCaptureCardInfo>true</isSupportCaptureCardInfo>
</AccessControl>

/ISAPI/System/Network/interfaces.summary: Get the information of multiple network interfaces.

get.summary: Get the information of multiple network interfaces.

/ISAPI/System/TwoWayAudio/channels.summary: Get audio parameters of all two-way audio channels.

/ISAPI/System/TwoWayAudio/channels/{chan.summary: Receive or send audio data from or to a specific two-way audio channel.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: communication session ID, which is required when the two-way audio is started between multiple channels and a channel; otherwise, the session ID is not required.

get.summary: Receive audio data from a specific two-way audio channel.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: communication session ID, which is required when the two-way audio is started between multiple channels and a channel; otherwise, the session ID is not required.

put.summary: Send audio data to a specific two-way audio channel.

/ISAPI/System/TwoWayAudio/channels/{chan.summary: Stop two-way audio of a specific channel
Start two-way audio of a specific channel.
